definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="shift"></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @p {"text":"There are </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="block_fluidtank_get"><value name="tank"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="direction"><block type="direction_unspecified"></block></value></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">mB of lava in this tank","color":"orange","bold":"false","italic":"false"}</field></block></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
